text: Right. Well…I do have ‘external data processing’ options as a fallback. I could extract all data through the api, combine it, and then report on it. But it would be a last resort I guess. Thanks for the idea.
Hey guys, Is there any way to make the phone number clickable in HubSpot contact list.

Hi all, fairly new to HubSpot API and looking for tips on extracting information for activity by contact (with date). Attached a snapshot of what I'm looking to extract --  I've had limited success based on filtering by activity type but ideally would like all activity data (for all customers). The documentation I've used to get this off the ground: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>

hi Brian,
idk about all activities (page views, form submitions) but everything else (notes,emails,calls,meeting) you can get using related endpoints from here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/calls>

Hi HubSpot team, I had this module coded for a GIPHY element on our home page (<https://www.assuaged.com>) - however, on mobile the image cuts half off. I am not sure how to fix this?

Any help is greatly appreciated!! I am happy to leave a review or pay a referral for anyone willing to help. Thank you!

CODE: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hdze5ONxURnB9QwT5eNQXUMwc3daI2sA4TtuDFFWgJM/edit?usp=sharing>
Do you have it on a page we can access so we can use developer tools?
How do I do that love? I have HubSpot :smiley:
Do you have the module in use on a page?
It is hosted under the Design Manager in HubSpot in a module, if that is what you mean, lol. :smiley:
Sorry I am brainless when it comes to some coding. :upside_down_face:
No worries I get it.
Do you have it on a page that you could share the url so I can see it?
<https://www.assuaged.com>
That I can do lol
Ok now which is the giphy getting cut off?
Scroll to the bottom of this section and paste it there - feel free to send a screenshot back to confirm it’s in the right place!

OMMMMGGeeeee thank you so much! I am so grateful. I love this nerdy stuff, I wish I got more into coding, I stopped when I was 13. I am pretty good at Marketing and Social Media. Please let me know if I can help in anyway, I am going for my PhD in Marketing. :heart:
Thank you <@UTQQ4TXCH> and <@U02NJACH5QS> both for trying to help. The coding certainly did the trick!
Happy to help!

Hey All,
Is there any way to export associated contact or company id in the custom object export list?
E.g: I have a custom object and we associated contact and company with this custom object but when exporting the custom object data then not able to find the associated contact ID and company ID
Any suggestions.
